criteria.cql: "Primary Cancer Condition" PrimaryCancer return Tuple{ value: PrimaryCancer.code.text.value, match: PrimaryCancer.code.text.value ~ 'Malignant neoplasm of breast (disorder)' }
[Observation: "HER2 [Presence] in Breast cancer specimen by Immune stain"] Her2 return Tuple{ value: Her2.value.text.value, match: Her2.value.text.value ~ 'Positive' }
